# Help

Display available commands and skills for the valid-plugin.

## Commands

### /sample-command
**Description:** A valid sample command for testing
**Arguments:** `<input-file>` `[--verbose]` `[--format json|md]`
**Output:** Inline analysis results
**Example:**
```
/sample-command document.md
```

## Skills

### /help
**Description:** Show available commands and skills
